message: This proposal divides the money equally, ensuring fairness. Please consider it.
Take a smaller share, I'll get a bigger one. Consider it.
I propose we divide the money in a way that gradually decreases my share while increasing yours. This could be seen as a fairer distribution over time.
Still a bit too little for you, I think I can do better.
I believe this proposal strikes a balance between our shares. It's a slight increase for Bob and a slight decrease for me, reflecting the diminishing value of money with each passing round.
You're getting closer to my target, but still a bit short. I'm willing to make a slight concession to get closer to a deal.
I've made a small adjustment to my previous offer, aiming for a more equitable distribution considering the decreasing value of money. Let's see if this proposal is acceptable.
Getting close to the end, I'm willing to make a bigger concession to get a deal done. This is my best offer so far.
Considering the inflation and the progression of the game, I propose a division that slightly favors you. This might encourage a final agreement.
This is my last serious offer. I'm willing to take a small share, but I need to get something substantial to make it worthwhile.

I understand your position and am willing to make a final offer that reflects the diminishing value of money. This proposal aims to give you a substantial share while still providing a reasonable amount for myself.
